text:
Kudos to #NadhimZahawi for making an intentionally silly statement
equating #YellowFever with #CoViD19 —
and a Yellow-Fever #vaccine with a #CoViDVaccine —
on 16 Feb after #BorisJohnson had deliberately done the same on 15 Feb.

https://t.co/C6eICnelTH

#VaccinePassport #vaccines https://t.co/6Q4zctPAg1
